entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -37.9°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
